The Elven Princess Wig
kDesc
The gently falling tresses of a high-born maid from another realm. Live the fantasy. \n\n Hair by Medusa [#Legal]
Les tresses délicates d'une jeune fille noble née dans un autre royaume. Vivez votre rêve. \n\n Coiffure par Medusa [#Legal]
Das wallende Haar einer hochgeborenen Maid aus einer anderen Welt. Lebe den Traum. \n\n Frisur von Medusa [#Legal]
Le trecce leggermente morbide di una fanciulla di alto rango proveniente da un altro reame. Vivi il sogno. \n\n Acconciatura di Medusa [#Legal]
Un peinado con largos mechones sobre los hombros digno de una dama de alta alcurnia de otro reino. Haz realidad tu fantasía. \n\n Peinado obra de Medusa [#Legal]
ファンタジーに満ち溢れた世界を想像するメイド風ヘアスタイル。 [#Legal]
외계에서 온 고귀한 태생 아가씨의 부드럽게 내려뜨린 땋은 머리칼. 팬터지를 즐겨요. \n\n 헤어 바이 메두사 [#Legal]
The gently falling tresses of a high-born maid from another realm. Live the fantasy. \n\n Hair by Medusa [#Legal]
留著滑順鬈髮的異國貴族少女。讓你美夢成真。 [#Legal]
留著滑順鬈髮的異國貴族少女。讓你美夢成真。 [#Legal]
The gently falling tresses of a high-born maid from another realm. Live the fantasy. \n\n Hair by Medusa [#Legal]
